products.name: The Pearl Advantage
products.description: Our Pearl Lash line of eyelashes is made from only the best materials in the industry. Each strand goes through a rigorous quality control process which requires it to pass through our 10 point quality inspection before it ever makes it to our shelf or yours. We have done extensive research and spent month working with world class leading manufacturers to deliver what we call a 'Pearl Lash Guarantee'. If you do not like the product please feel free to send it back for 100% refund. We can say that we are proud of our quality and we know you will enjoy our products.
